attributes.action: let the British people vote in a referandum on the European Union and to allow a change in the law to protect british jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the normal working people of Britain are looking at losing our jobs in the recession and yet we have disputes at oil refineries all over the country due to the foreign contractors stating they will not employ British Labour. There are now too many industries in the UK where the normal British people are struggling while the fat cat bosses sit and just think about the profits. We keep being told the Britsih Goverment cannot do anything about this as its EU law. We the British people never voted on weather we wanted this EU law lets stand up and be counted and put the GREAT back into Great Britain

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
